website_summaries.verdict: An advanced smart padlock designed with a simple-to-use fingerprint scanner.
pros: Rectangular design makes the lock easy to store in small bags and pockets
Fingerprint scanner works quickly, generally taking under one second to open
cons: Fingerprint scanner is small, potentially being difficult to use for those with larger fingers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fingerprint lock!
customer_reviews.text: Came with awesome package. The operation process wasn't straightforward as the instructions are not intuitive in sections. But once you are familiar with the operation process, it will be very conevenient for you to operate it. In addition, I have to say this is a brilliant way to go keyless and I hate those key lock and bluetooth lock that need to install app. This fingerprints recognition is really good and fast. It doesn't have to install any app., that is a good news for me! Now, it has been working perfectly for about 2 weeks now. Haven't foresee any problem yet. Will update this review if it need.
customer_reviews.author: XIANER

customer_reviews.title: Fascinating Lock!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive lock! Other lock you need to carry the key with you anywhere but this one just need your fingerprint! The instruction is easy to follow. After setting you just need to press your finger on it then it unlocks. The battery is strong as well and holds for long time(more than 6 months according to the manual). The lock is very sensitive to your fingerprint just like iPhone screen lock. You can add several fingerprint as you want. The size is small and it is easy to take. The lock is safe and sound. Best lock I have ever use! Strong recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: Terry X.Y. Qin

customer_reviews.title: Wire lock part seems thin- but rest easy!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if the directions are on target. It was easy for me to set up as the “main” person, but I always felt like we weren’t getting it right for everyone else. The bizarre part is that even though what the directions said would happen didn’t yet their fingers were coded in so it wasn’t as hard as it seemed. After I didn’t follow them, I got my husband & kid in. Also the lock part isn’t that thick so I’m sure it could be cut open, but anyone willing to take the time to cut to get into the shed can have the lawn mower. I’m just happy my kid locks it now!
customer_reviews.author: M. Farrace

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The product works as hoped for about 5 months, then started to not respond and will not charge, customer service sent a new lock and the new lock arrived defective.
customer_reviews.author: JEFF N.

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: first the packaging is very nice and perfect to give a s a gift if desired. The lock comes charged so I was able to play with it right out of the box which is a nice touch. The directions are not super clear but once I read through them and reviewed it was pretty easy to figure out. The fingerprint scanner worked great and I was able to load more than 1 print. The lock itself is very sturdy and strong perfect for what I need it for. great buy
customer_reviews.author: Steimke

customer_reviews.title: Cool gadget must have
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect lock for people like me constantly forgetting the passcode. Plus the sleek and modern look follows the trend. The instruction is clear enough to me. It only took me couple mins to set up five fingers for testing and fun. :) I do like the capability of having multiple accounts which allows you share the lock/locker. Overall it is a cool gadget just what I need. I do have a fear though that the lock is dead hanging in the middle of nowhere. It says one full charge offers 2500-3000 times actions. I would charge it once a while when I can.
customer_reviews.author: B.Y

customer_reviews.title: Great Lock
customer_reviews.text: This is really useful. I carry this to the gym locker. I used to use the combination lock, but I often forget the code. This saves me from that. You lose your code easily and not your finger. With the instructions, it is very easy to set up. I personally think it is very convenient and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Smith

customer_reviews.title: works quickly and consistently
customer_reviews.text: they nailed it. the lock works whenever i need it to. took a sec to figure it out and get setup but going to the gym is much easier now. only con would be its heft. won't take much to blow this thing wide open or just cut the cable. works perfect for the gym though
customer_reviews.author: BUS

customer_reviews.title: Strips Easily. Try something else.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money... This lock easily strips from the mechanism and becomes useless. No excess force was applied; it just stopped fully engaging. It's easy to set up and generally reads fingerprints (except when it doesn't). However, this becomes useless when you can easily pull the cable out of the lock, defeating the entire purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus H.

customer_reviews.title: saves holding a key!
customer_reviews.text: My familys plan to travel to to to america and had to get a secure lock bcause one of my friend's suitcase was miss-placed in the airport. It is just so cool to have your fingerprint in the lock where you wont have anyone try to take the lock off.
customer_reviews.author: Amarnath Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great locker without key.
customer_reviews.text: it works great! I don’t need to bring my key anymore, it is rely convinient nd useful.
customer_reviews.author: BrettQ

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Use it for my pistol bag for the shooting range, works perfectly with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Battery life expectation is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: After buying a few brands, and very disappointed with the battery, the battery life with the new generation is excellent and reliable. I have three already.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A Segarra

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to check before return window closes
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the item came with an Admin lock that I have read is not able to be bypassed. I also missed my return window before I attempted to set up and use at the gym. My bad for missing the window, but I should have received in working order.
customer_reviews.author: Ashli Colón

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable and caused extra stress during travel
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this but it is not reliable. During a vacation this has caused a lot of stress and I gave up even using it. Programming fingers was easy and I even moved my finger around each time scanning. But as you can see from my video, the lock mechanism jams and does not open. We were in a rush and this caused a lot of extra stress when your stuff is locked up. Build quality is nice but like I said, unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Phan

customer_reviews.title: Registering fingerprint from different angles as additional users increases unlock
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is excellent. The unlocking process with your fingerprint is reliable and consistent. I found that registering your fingerprint from different angles as additional users increased the likelihood of a successful unlock attempt. The few drawbacks I've found are that there is no way to disable the beeping sound when attempting to unlock, and that the directions are a little lacking.

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband as a Christmas present. He was able to set his fingerprint as the admin fingerprint. But then he could not unlock the padlock with his fingerprint. he could not add any other fingerprints. So we returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Eagan

customer_reviews.title: Total Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The finger-print reader itself is ok, sorta. It has trouble reading finger-prints after taking a shower. But the biggest problem is that the actual cable interface with the lock has a huge design flaw. Just pull really hard and it opens.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Earl Martin

customer_reviews.title: You need to have ur finger EXACTLY )*(3
customer_reviews.text: It sometimes takes forever because u have to have it exactly the same way everytime and what if the biometric doesnt work anymore? I wont have a way to get it unlocked.
customer_reviews.author: Stormy

customer_reviews.title: convenient
customer_reviews.text: Very Impressive lock! It is very easy to set up, took me 1 min to figure out. The blue light wish flash every time when you placed the fingerprint that means it's successful, repeat for 10 times. It's made of great quality. I love this lock because then I don't need to worry about losing keys, which I always do. Easy to carry, small and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Secure and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Reliable and secure. Unlock in one second. No problem with the fingerprint register.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Villabona

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating design
customer_reviews.text: It’s too sensitive. Once locked, it often take 10 or more tries to get it unlocked. Frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Lanham

customer_reviews.title: This lock is for everybody
customer_reviews.text: Terrible lock. Literally everyone in my area at work was able to open it with their finger print. I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: joyfulnoise

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the product. It feels heavy and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sen cai

customer_reviews.title: Would be great had it stayed
customer_reviews.text: It worked for 2 days then just quit I could not get it going again. Would be great had it stayed operational
customer_reviews.author: Linda Shiska

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: The lock is rechargeable. It's easy to set up follow the instructions. I bought it for locking my travel bag. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Z

customer_reviews.title: Like it and buy it!
customer_reviews.text: The lock is a bit heavy,small in size and does not tak up much space,but it is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: CJ LUNA

customer_reviews.title: Very productive item.
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed with safety and convenience offers by this padlock. It’s lightweight and strong and great with fingerprints locking systemThis padlock gave me a better alternative.Everyone should try this product.
customer_reviews.author: Blanche Culb

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: I really love this lock. I use it for my snow boarding bag. It's so convenient for me, cuz when I need to unlock it, I'm usually freaking tired at that moment. Let me deal with password? No way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product idea
customer_reviews.text: good product. you dont need to think about remember keys all the time. fingerprint reader is quick. but i am still trying to understand master key and user key. sounds a bit complicated. great for parents.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Best lock ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. If you follow the step and we the fingerprint, then it is really easy to use. I used it for my school locker and it is really useful
customer_reviews.author: Rainjill

customer_reviews.title: Big Toughness in a Small Package
customer_reviews.text: Multiple people can be programmed with an administrator overseeing everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Metal cable is quite flexible and seems strong for its width. Definitely a deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Convinent lock for my gym locker
customer_reviews.text: Very convinent , I use this for my gym locker room. So I don’t need worry about the key when I workout. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Fang Cundi

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Great value for such a decent lock. Definitely thumbs up for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tianhao

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!!
customer_reviews.text: After returning 2 other fingerprint locks because they didn't work well, I finally ordered this one. I was pleasantly surprised! This lock works great! Recognizes my fingerprint quickly every time. I use it several times a day. It has a long battery life. When the battery does get low, it does this certain "chime" to let you know that it is time to recharge the battery. This product is definitely worth the price. I'm buying another one today.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Lentine

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get the thing to work, also having trouble finding support. good luck with that.
customer_reviews.author: Abbyme

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: This was so annoying it never not for even a second worked. I have not tried to return it yet because I just haven't had the time but it was a complete disappointment all around because I was excited to put this to use and then nothing.
customer_reviews.author: TheMegTime

customer_reviews.title: Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: Had to cut it off because the fingerprint reader stopped working!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Nifty
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes takes a few tries to get my finger in the right position to open, but ovrrall it works well.
customer_reviews.author: utahemt

customer_reviews.title: Promotion
customer_reviews.text: I would like a sample of your product to advertise and promote on my social media pages..
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

product_meta.title: SZHSR Lock-New Generation Portable Fingerprint Padlock Travel Security 360 ° Touch 1 Second Unlock,More Sensitive Waterproof, Suitcases,Handbags,School Bags,Cabinets(Silver), 2.36 X 0.86 X 3.54 in
product_meta.description:
Always lost your key?

Always forget your unlock codes?

Get tired of using clumsy APP to unlock?

Well, SZHSR Fingerprint Locks help you!

▶UPGRADED SMART UNLOCK, UNLOCK WITHIN 1 S!
Build-in US advanced fingerprint identification chip with 360 Ā°fingerprint collection, only take 1s to unlock.

▶YOUR FINGER IS YOUR KEY!
Using capacitive sensing technology to prevent your fingerprint from being copied, no longer need to worry about password leaks.

▶SORRY, Mr. Thief, YOU ARE UNEMPLOYED!
Made of high-toughness Zinc alloy metal and steel wire. Effectively prevent prying, smashing or cutting, stealing.

▶MUTI-USER SETTING, SUPER PRACTICAL!
Can entry 10 sets of fingerprints. Suitable for individuals, couples, families or groups. No more keys, codes or any tedious APP, your finger is your key.

▶EMERGENCY USB CHARGE PORT!
Have an external USB mobile power emergency jack, you can charge immediately to unlock when it outage. One time charging can be used for 3000 times.

▶YOUR LIFE ASSISTANT!
Designed with IP65 waterproof, anti-dust, low energy saving and environmental protection. Widely use in suitcases, golf bags, handbags, school bags, cabinets and so on. Effectively protect your valuables

▶THE BEST GIFT FOR YOUR FAMILY AND FRIENDS
Why not send your family and friends this creative fingerprint lock to keep their stuffs safe? SZHSR Fingerprint lock can be widely used as gym padlock, golf bag lock, suitcase lock, cabinet lock, drawer lock, bike lock and so on. Fashion appearance, practical function, lightweight shape make it to be the first choice as most thoughtful gift.
feature_bullets: 【MORE SENSITIVE & FASTER】- Built-in US advanced fingerprint identification chip with high penetration, excellent recognition, low misjudgment rate. You can unlock it within 1 second!

【HIGH-LEVEL SAFETY PERFORMANCE】- Zinc alloy metal structure and high toughness steel wire to prevent prying or crushing or cutting. Designed with anti-thief, anti-dust and anti-water function. Built-in biometric sensing technology to prevent your fingerprint from being copied.
【SMALL AND EXQUISITE】- Only 60g weight,small as lipstick. But it can set 10 fingerprint identification accounts and one time charging can support 3000 times use.
【100% QUALITY ASSURANCE】- 24 hours stand by service, 30 days unconditional replacement, 180 days warranty. Contact us if you have any question.

【BEST GIFT FOR FAMILY AND FRIENDS】- SZHSR fingerprint lock can be widely used as gym padlock, suitcase lock, cabinet lock, drawer lock and so on. Fashion appearance, practical function, lightweight shape make it to be the first choice as most thoughtful gift.
